title: Alien Bombshell as Dave Rubin Hosts Claims of UFO Crashes and Non-Human Intelligence—and the Government Knows It
description: Shocking claims of UFO crashes, alien bodies and an 80 year cover up surface as Dave Rubin hosts explosive interview on non-human intelligence.

title: Pilot Spots UFO Hovering Near Private Jet
description: A pilot of a private jet reported seeing a “strange, small object” floating beside his aircraft thousands of feet above Rhode Island. According to newly resurfaced audio shared in October by the YouTube channel VASAviation, the pilot contacted air traffic control at Rhode Island T.F. title: Alien ‘corpses’, RAF cover-ups & royal nuclear bunkers... inside eerie top-secret UFO research base dubbed ‘UK’s Area 51’
description: AN abandoned RAF site dubbed Britain’s ‘Area 51’ is a magnet for UFO hunters, urban explorers and conspiracy theorists who believe it was once home to government investigations into aliens. From the outside, Rudloe Manor in Wiltshire looks like your typical 17th century Grade II listed house set in quiet rural surroundings. But in 1950 it...
